grails.plugin.multitenant.core.impl
Class CurrentTenantThreadLocal

java.lang.Object
  grails.plugin.multitenant.core.impl.CurrentTenantThreadLocal
All Implemented Interfaces:
CurrentTenant
public class CurrentTenantThreadLocal
extends Object
implements CurrentTenant

Stores the current tenant id on the current thread. Have a look at the link below if you want more information on ThreadLocal.

See Also:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1490919/purpose-of-threadlocal
